feed.title: Budibase Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.15
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Remove automation definition from trigger response by @CSLTech in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16371
  • Workspaces on my app list by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16339
  • Don't return any workspace app is flag is not enabled by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16373
  • Never run disabled migrations by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16375
  • Don't return any workspace app is flag is not enabled by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16374

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.14...3.12.15

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.16
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Joes updates to icon and styles by @joebudi in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16317
  • oAuth2 scope support by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16358
  • Render apps on builder index by @adrinr in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16341
  • Spectrum to phosphor icon migration by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16218

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.15...3.12.16

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.17
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • undo manifest mistakes from icon migration to fix divider component by @andz-bb in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16385
  • Icon fixes by @aptkingston in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16386
  • Fixed an issue were the bottom logo was stretched due to flex on some browsers by @ConorWebb96 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16388

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.16...3.12.17

entry.title: New release for Budibase: 3.12.19
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Removing codemirror whitespace highlighting by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16392
  • Individual publish status API by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16360
  • New machine, new dependencies by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16372
  • Fixing Accordion icons by @mike12345567 in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16394
  • Filter and Gridblock fixes by @deanhannigan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16391
  • Add user count to usages by @melohagan in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16395
  • Improved automation calling by @shogunpurple in https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/pull/16399

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Budibase/budibase/compare/3.12.18...3.12.19
